Name: Blazi-Seal
LongDescription: Slightly boosts Attack and Special Defense. Keep it in the Treasure Bag to give its benefit to all of these team members: Torchic, Combusken, and Blaziken.  Swap a Blazi-Claw and a Blazi-Card for a Blazi-Seal at the Croagunk Swap Shop.  See what happens if you collect all three of these items!
